p: In the RCT of Chay et al. lower average symptom scores for nausea, vomiting, pain, insomnia, constipation, and diarrhea were reported by patients supplemented with Coriolus versicolor during conventional treatment of HCC patients compared to placebo ( Chay et al., 2017). Verum patients also experienced significantly less pain (group difference: −38.6 95% CI: 65.5 to −11.8; p = 0.011) and loss of appetite (group difference: 39.7 95% CI: 64.5 to −15.0, p = 0.006) during treatment compared to placebo patients.
